alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:33AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, light snow expected later tonight with heavier snow showers Monday. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches from 5,000 to 7,000 feet and up to 10 inches above 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory Tuesday evening into Wednesday expect new snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds will be stronger gusting as high as 70 mph at times. The combination of falling snow and the gusty winds will produce areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
